name: Conference Call Contest
description:
Conference Call Contest is a  multiplayer game you play over video chat by finding, showing and comparing objects in your home.

You and your friends are tasked with filling the camera window with certain colors, comparing objects by their size or finding books, albums, games or movies with specific imagery on their respective covers.

The game is played by sharing the screen of the player, who is running the game. Players keep track of their score themselves.

Have fun playing and #staysafe at home!
